abstract.t: This describes an experimental policy for use of the class D addressspace using 233/8 as the experimental statically assigned subset ofthe class D address space. This new experimental allocation is inaddition to those described on [IANA] (e.g. [RFC2365]).This memo is a product of the Multicast-Address Allocation workinggroup (MALLOC) in the Internet and Transport Areas of the InternetEngineering Task Force. Submit comments to <malloc@catarina.usc.edu>or the authors.
